text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We're entering the homestretch! In<n>the lead by five to six
lengths is<n>Silence Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The rest of the racers are shifting into<n>high gear in pursuit!
Can Silence<n>Suzuka outrun them? They're closing<n>in by
the second!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
But Silence Suzuka puts the pedal to<n>the metal and speeds
off, leaving the<n>others behind!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka! It's Silence Suzuka!<n>She crosses the finish
line and claims<n>victoryyy!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Another great race for Silence Suzuka<n>and her runaway
style! She's<n>answered all of our sincerest hopes<n>and
wildest dreams!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I don't know what scenery awaits<n>me, but I'll run towards
it regardless...<n>together with you all!
